body: Saddest incest story ever. I'm not horny. I'm contemplating the priesthood.

When the plot is more thicc than the thighs, you know it's a great doujin. I really love the way Rei and Mei's relationship progressed, its really done well. Couldn't even fap because of how good the plot is.
Can't nut because of the plot.

@JHW51 : I LOVE sex scene in this series. Some are very-well drawn, especially the siblings'. But they just felt more like fillers to attracts H crowds than actually driven the plot. You'll see why soon enough, especially after the plot really thickens.
This is not a great hentai manga, but it's a perfect murder mystery manga

I don't agree with you guys not wanting the sex scenes in this story. I think it's refreshing with a story, that doesn't have mega oppais with a chinpo between them on page 2. Furthermore if it had been an ordinary manga I wouldn't have found it. @KenGotTheLexGs: Thanks for your hard work. You've done a great job. Please continue with this fantastic story (as quick as possible since I can't wait)! Note: I'm not sure Masato is the killer. I think the author want us to believe he's the killer.
i think it was shown in the chapter 1 when masato fell off, i kinda felt sus at the floor and voila
Damn don't speculate ya'll, i've a theory that the murderer is Masato older brother that he says he's going to visit! And the reason that those items were there is because he's covering up for him
if anyone's interested in RAWs: Part 4: https://nhentai.net/g/210889/116/ Part 5: https://nhentai.net/g/219584/467/ Part 6: https://nhentai.net/g/238494/266/
Having sex with the guy that murdered your Sister. Fuck.

The author better off making an actual manga lol. The story is way more interesting than the sex part imo. Already suspected masato since ch.1 and cant believe it actually leads to it. Dang cliffhanger

this aint even fap material... since chapter 1

but boi the story is interesting as fuck
HORY SHEEET

@nebunie : Yes, and I could say the same to most Fuuga's works. I think right now he could work as adult mangaka instead hentai. Most, if not all his works are so plot-focused most sex scenes are but fillers/ non-relevant. It's even more obvious with Ani to Imouto no Jijou. I nearly burst out laughing with the last sex scene in that one. For this one, I'd say it could've been much better as adult manga with only few key sex scenes instead. But it's still fantastic I couldn't get it out of my mind for a very long while, yet I still think it could've been better though.
Damn the end of this chapter make me can't sleep well this night, i can't wait for the next translated chapter, it's been a long time since I got hooked by the plot from the ero doujin

@A-san : It's true, you could remove most of the sex scenes with the story still intact. Actually, when I went on reading the earlier chapters, I skipped one. The plot has got me hooked. I hope I'll get my hands on a copy, too. 😁

(This is the first time I return to a manga to read new comments.)
Damn this one has better plot than most of harem or cooking manga

@KenGotTheLexGs : All in all, I really like this H manga (bought hard copy and finished it a long time ago) but I need to say it's actually detective manga disguised as hentai with sex scenes as fillers. Even all sex scenes are very-well drawn (ESPECIALLY the last EP), most are so over-the-top and felt unnecessary/not relevant to the plot you could remove 90% of them and the story is still very well-intact. Like this one, it was stated that Rei-Mei are so unpopular at school, but why is Rei so good at having sex (at later times too)? And after this? It's like huhh here's the plot > uhh sex? > ummm plot! > uhh here's sex again so please continue reading! You could try removing all sex scenes altogether except Aki-Masato from 1st EP and the very last one in the last EP (and mod it with eements from this EP so it's their 1st) and you'll see the story started progressing much smoother. But it's a hentai manga with hentai logic... so... welp.
What if she is the killer and planted it in the boyfriends home

"It'll melt soon" That was just perfect. Also I knew from the start that Masato was definitely the killer, let's just wait and see where this is going. (they finally did it, oh god incest is so perfect I swear)

Everyone must have thought glasses was the killer from the start but chapter 1 when she said onee chan i was certain it was him. I suppose there's a chance that stuff was planted but i doubt it. I wonder why he put their aunt and uncle up to killing the mom and dad though.

@kengotthelexgs

Is it confirmed on whether Mei and Rei are related? Or is this going to be another rug pull where they turn out to be step siblings?
